C a r r e g a n d o

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements onInit{ loader: boolean = true; public loading() { setTimeout(() => { this.loader = true; }, 1000); } ngOnInit }
